relevant_findings.heent: Normocephalic/atractive, sclerae icteric, mucous membranes dry
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, with good air movement
relevant_findings.heart: Regular rate and rhythm, + systolic murmur (radiation from fistula)
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft/nondistended, + mild tenderness to palpation, no rebound/guarding
relevant_findings.neurological: Awake, alert and oriented x3, asterixis

relevant_findings.chest_exam: Bilateral plate atelectasis on the lung bases consistent with poor ventilation

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Bilateral plate atelectasis on the lung bases may have increased slightly over the last 24 hours.
